inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of COPD according to the Global Initiative for chronic Obstructive Lung Disease (GOLD) Guideline16
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Previous spirometry showing FEV1/FVC ratio of <0.70 with an AECOPD
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of asthma, bronchiectasis or other chronic lung disease apart from COPD
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man with COPD and shortness of breath. He has a history of BPH and smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
